summary: A young alien and a teenage earthling fall in love, and plot to stop the alien's race from using Earth as a food-breeding ground for giant lobsters from their planet.
cast: David Love|Dawn Bender|Bryan Grant|Harvey B. Dunn|Tom Graeff|King Moody|Helen Sage|Frederick Welch|Carl Dickinson|Sonia Torgeson|Billy Bridges|James Conklin|Gene Sterling|Ralph Lowe|Bill DeLand|Ursula Hansen|Robert B. Williams|Don DeClue|Don Chambers|Jim MacGeorge|Kent Rogers|Sol Resnick|Bob Regas|Ross Evans
keywords: giant lobster|alien contact|alien invasion|space monster|psychotronic film
title: Adolescentes del espacio exterior
